title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Learning Space Design and Interest Development for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design student-led project-based learning environments for social studies by applying learning space design principles (TEK).
Learners can produce three customized activity modules that stimulate learner interest as mobile microlearning modules.
Learners can propose methods to measure the effectiveness of learning space design using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
